trans-unit.source: Represents a text box control that can be hosted in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl> class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> interface, allowing it to be hosted in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> when the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl> classe é um tipo especializado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle que implementa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> interface, permitindo que ele seja hospedado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> quando a célula está em modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> evento para executar a inicialização personalizada do controle de edição quando uma célula entra em modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar as características de exibição do controle, defina as propriedades do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade em vez de definir as propriedades do controle retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl" /> class.
This default constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor padrão define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: Application code typically won't explicitly create instances of this class, because this is performed automatically when the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is created.
trans-unit.target: Código do aplicativo normalmente não cria explicitamente as instâncias dessa classe, porque isso é executado automaticamente quando o contendo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> é criado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to use as the model for the UI.
Changes the control's user interface (UI) to be consistent with the specified cell style.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl" /> instance.
A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> instance that supports the ControlType UIA property.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> object is only available in applications that are recompiled to target versions of the .NET Framework starting with the .NET Framework 4.7.2.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> objeto só está disponível em aplicativos que são recompilados para versões de destino do .NET Framework, iniciando com o .NET Framework 4.7.2.

trans-unit.source: Applications that target an earlier version of the .NET Framework but are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.2 can opt in to this feature by using a compatibility switch.
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos que uma versão anterior do .NET Framework de destino, mas que estão em execução no .NET Framework 4.7.2 podem aceitar esse recurso usando uma opção de compatibilidade.

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see [What's New in Accessibility in the .NET Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [o que há de novo no acessibilidade no .NET Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the text box control.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell" /> that contains this control; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if there is no associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell" /> que contém este controle; caso contrário, <see langword="null" /> se não houver associado não <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is automatically set when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> is created within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é automaticamente definida quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> é criado em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ou adicionado a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formatted representation of the current value of the text box control.
An object representing the current value of this control.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o valor atual deste controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Text%2A> property contains the actual data contained by the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Text%2A> propriedade contém os dados reais contidos pelo controle.

trans-unit.source: The data is the string shown in the text box of the control.
trans-unit.target: Os dados são a cadeia de caracteres mostrada na caixa de texto do controle.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.EditingControlFormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of this string.
trans-unit.target: Em contraste, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.EditingControlFormattedValue%2A> propriedade é a representação formatada da cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Since a text box uses plain text strings, these two properties are essentially the same.
trans-unit.target: Como uma caixa de texto usa cadeias de caracteres de texto sem formatação, essas duas propriedades são essencialmente as mesmas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the owning cell's parent row.
The index of the row that contains the owning cell; -1 if there is no owning row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula proprietária; -1 se não houver nenhuma linha proprietária.

trans-unit.source: The row index for the column headers row is -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha para a linha de cabeçalhos de coluna é -1.

trans-unit.source: The row index for a shared row is also -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha para uma linha compartilhada também é -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current value of the text box control has changed.
<see langword="true" /> if the value of the control has changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o valor do controle é alterado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl.EditingControlValueChanged%2A> property is set to `true` to indicate that the owning cell's value has changed, and the cell may need to be updated to reflect this change in value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl.EditingControlValueChanged%2A> está definida como `true` para indicar que o valor da célula proprietário foi alterado e a célula pode precisar ser atualizado para refletir essa alteração de valor.

trans-unit.source: The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after it has updated itself.
trans-unit.target: A célula ou tabela proprietária redefinirá a essa propriedade como `false` depois que ela foi atualizada em si.

trans-unit.source: When the control is initialized, this property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle é inicializado, essa propriedade é definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> that represents the key that was pressed.
<see langword="true" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> wants to process the <c>keyData</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key that the editing control should process or a special key that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> should process.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key that should be handled by the editing control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets the cursor used when the mouse pointer is over the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel" /> but not over the editing control.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> that represents the mouse pointer used for the editing panel.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> que representa o ponteiro do mouse usado para o painel de edição.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> values that specifies the data error context.
Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the formatted version of the cell contents.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" /> event.
The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged" /> event and notifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> of the text change.
<see langword="true" /> to select the cell contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Prepares the currently selected cell for editing.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> indicating the key that was pressed.
Processes key events.
<see langword="true" /> if the key event was handled by the editing control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This method ensures that the ENTER key is ignored so that carriage return and line feeds aren't stored in the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Esse método garante que a tecla ENTER é ignorada para que o retorno de carro e alimentação de linha não é armazenadas no valor da célula.

trans-unit.source: This method also allows the cell contents to be selected when CTRL+A is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Esse método também permite que o conteúdo da célula a ser selecionado quando é pressionada CTRL + A.

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this method.
trans-unit.target: para chamadores imediatos usar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell contents need to be repositioned whenever the value changes.

<see langword="true" /> if the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode" /> is set to <see langword="true" /> and the alignment property is not set to one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment" /> values that aligns the content to the top; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a célula <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode" /> é definido como <see langword="true" /> e a propriedade de alinhamento não está definida para uma da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment" /> valores que se alinha o conteúdo na parte superior; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
